search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Convertri (convertri.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Convertri can be found at https://www.convertri.com/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
“Convertri is the best funnel builder I’ve ever used and their support is honestly incredible. You really have to try it, to believe it.”

![Image 1](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Ffbd34555d40757fe66e027414975a4a0bf394699%2FGroup%20177-1.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=40&h=40)

Sohail Chatur

![Image 2](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fbcb8ece07f79ffa4d76c7add65860b74b01c2f8f%2FMonthly-Mobile.svg)

Free Trial Currently Available On All New Accounts

Simple Plans. No Hidden Fees.  World Class Support When You Need It Most.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 3](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F587032f0e05ccaa0af7999a2eabc58fcd74ca0d4%2FGroup%20202.svg)

![Image 4](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fc2c85fab5c8f8a1dde22e7885cb80f3acc8b6f1d%2FGroup%20203.svg)

![Image 5](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F77bc819b04277c4b058f9a9070a4a7f83ef2f15b%2FImg.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=504&h=620)

Every business has different needs, and every business owner operates at their own unique level of experience. When it comes to our plans, we aim to meet you where you are.

That way we can give you precisely what you need to get the best from Convertri from the moment you take the free trial.

![Image 6](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fa644fecad0595610a97f4b23e75df382faff3af8%2FImg-2.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=696&h=724)

If you’re just starting out, we don’t want to overload you with features you won’t use. We just want you to be able to build a landing page and start collecting leads before the day is done.

If that’s you, take a trial of our Convert plan.

![Image 7](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F31f0c111cc27cf9a2aa70b162225a4762b812a3a%2FVisual.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=504&h=620)

Similarly, if you work with clients, you'll need to see Convertri operating at its full workhorse potential. In that instance, there's no point in us holding back features.

You need to see and use them all, which is what the Maximize plan gives you.

![Image 8](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F6b1f7ee5d1bec983b6b92e9817e7a939320a6964%2FVisual-2.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=726&h=700)

For most people, the sweet spot is somewhere in the middle.

You want to build funnels, make sales, create membership sites, build websites, and generally do whatever you need to do, whenever you need to do it, to move your business forwards.

That’s precisely what the Scale plan lets you do, and why it’s our most popular plan.

![Image 9](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F15c7b129871c89b826d1d192e7ea13c34bcdc4fe%2FVisual-3.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=504&h=620)

All our plans come with the same 14-day free trial. That way, you can make an informed choice on a tool we hope will power your business to success, for a long time to come.

Seeing is believing.

So why not pick the plan that matches your current goals and get started with a free trial today.

![Image 10](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F587032f0e05ccaa0af7999a2eabc58fcd74ca0d4%2FGroup%20202.svg)

![Image 11](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fc3bf96d7f3ea03c34146d99aa3da3772a5a2b5a6%2FGroup%20205.svg)

![Image 12](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F13742fe04b0e349c5a8da1d32902f4e8897ccab0%2FGroup%20206.svg)

![Image 13](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fc652b21834d94ce0bcef63d5acd498003b54ed4d%2FGroup%20207.svg)

![Image 14](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fc3bf96d7f3ea03c34146d99aa3da3772a5a2b5a6%2FGroup%20205.svg)

![Image 15](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F13742fe04b0e349c5a8da1d32902f4e8897ccab0%2FGroup%20206.svg)

![Image 16](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fc652b21834d94ce0bcef63d5acd498003b54ed4d%2FGroup%20207.svg)

Get Started Today
-----------------

Our plans are designed to support you as your business grows. No contracts. No hassles. Just pick a plan that gives you what you need when you need it and keep on keeping on.

![Image 17](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F38c4aabf64354606d29db3cb5edc3d78ffd2d100%2FGroup%20218.svg)

“Convertri is Awesome. I’ve tried ClickFunnels and LeadPages, but Convertri pages load way faster, and you don’t have to fight with the software to put something where you want it.”

![Image 18](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fcbb75fb1381d792638c4d047c24a7873ced826b7%2FGroup%20177.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=40&h=40)

Swen Halverson

“Absolute game changer for me, able to crank out super high-quality pages, no hassles with hosting, or WordPress hacking, great library of templates, super responsive team & leadership. Highly recommended.”

![Image 19](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F875660a53a1544ab68eb6270f9dc2eb40821aa34%2FGroup%20177-2.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=40&h=40)

Billy Martin

“It's a bargain, a complete masterpiece.”

![Image 20](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fddd293aaabea148a4eb14195538116a1eb7e282b%2FMask%20group.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=56&h=56)

Richard Conduit

FAQ
---

Can I build websites with Convertri? 
-------------------------------------

![Image 21](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

You sure can – in fact, this website was built using it! We’ve got a special menu element to make linking all your pages together simple, and with the shared headers and footers feature you can setup a single master-header (or footer!) for every page in your site, so you only need to update it once.

Why are fast pages so important?
--------------------------------

![Image 22](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

Short answer: because they make you more money.

Longer answer: Recent research by Google has shown that 53% of people leave your mobile page if it takes more than 3 seconds to load.

That means of all the traffic you’ve worked hard to drive, all the clicks you’ve paid and optimised for... if your page is slow, over half of them never even see it. Half your potential conversions gone at a stroke.

But the faster your page loads, the more of your clicks actually see your content. That means more of those clicks can convert, and you get more leads for the same ad spend. People have halved their per-lead cost, JUST by switching to Convertri.

Devin Zander is the CEO of SMAR7 Apps. He spends a LOT on ads, and that means he needs the best-performing landing pages going.

That’s why he took Convertri for a spin, and found he was getting twice as many leads for the same amount of ad spend. Convertri makes a BIG difference.

![Image 23](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Faf6e55bc1aa14a52123a375643c48bc3b180a9c0%2FQuote.png?auto=compress,format&fit=scale&w=379&h=338)

What happens to my pages if the app goes down?
----------------------------------------------

![Image 24](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

Nothing. We made sure of it. With most page builders, the pages they make are connected to the app, which means if the app has a problem, it takes all the published pages down with it.

This sucks. No-one wants to find their pages suddenly 404’ing in the middle of a campaign.

So we built Convertri differently. Published pages are separated from the main Convertri system, which means it doesn’t matter how bad a day we’re having. Your pages will ALWAYS stay live.

Do you integrate with all my favourite tools?
---------------------------------------------

![Image 25](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

We’ve got a huge range of native integrations, so probably :)

But if you want something that isn’t on the list, don’t worry. Not only do we add new native integrations frequently, we’ve also got Zapier to cover everything else.

Can I use my own domain?
------------------------

![Image 26](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

Sure can.  You can either transfer your domain to our nameservers and manage it directly from within Convertri, or we support CNAME setup so you can publish your pages on a subdomain and keep your domain management with your registrar.

Can I use Convertri with Wordpress?
-----------------------------------

![Image 27](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

You bet.  Our Convertri Connector Wordpress plugin – which you’ll be able to download for free from inside your Convertri account – lets you display any Convertri page on your Wordpress site.

Do you provide SSL or do I need to use something like Cloudflare?
-----------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 28](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

We do it all for you. Your Convertri subdomain has SSL by default, and you can switch it on for all your custom domains with a single click.

What if I go over my traffic limit?
-----------------------------------

![Image 29](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

We don’t operate an automatic cut-off – unlike some services, we’re not going to punish you for an unexpected spike in views. If it happens, you’ll be sent an e-mail letting you know, and you’ll be able to add extra traffic to your Convertri account for $30/250k impressions.

Do you provide support?
-----------------------

![Image 30](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2Fb56cf72afe041df6d64677a964f03e7e7c40e4cc%2FDivisor%20Lines.svg)

We sure do. If you ever need a hand you can contact support@convertri.com to speak to one of our team.  Alternatively we’ve got a well-stocked knowledgebase with over 200 articles, and a Facebook group with thousands of Convertri users.

![Image 31](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F8309e57990c436a5b8e10b9e5d20baea07f47196%2FGroup%20222.svg)

The Philosophy Behind Our Plans
-------------------------------

![Image 32](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F8309e57990c436a5b8e10b9e5d20baea07f47196%2FGroup%20222.svg)

![Image 33](https://convertri.imgix.net/d106fe32-1e97-11e6-829d-066a9bd5fb79%2F8309e57990c436a5b8e10b9e5d20baea07f47196%2FGroup%20222.svg)

![Image 34: cookie](https://cdn.convertri.com/img/script-consent/v1/cookie-bite-solid.svg)

###### We use cookies...

...to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners. Is this okay with you?

[Privacy Policy](https://www.convertri.com/privacypolicy)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Convertri offers a 14-day free trial for all plans. Additional traffic can be purchased for $30 per 250k impressions.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Designed for users starting out, focusing on building landing pages and collecting leads.
Most popular plan, suitable for building funnels, making sales, creating membership sites, and websites.
Designed for users working with clients, offering full feature access.
